summary: An Interrior Overhaul Of Alchemy Shops
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][font=Arial][i][color=#000000]This mod is a part of Immersive Interiors pack which include :
[/color]1. [color=#000000]Immersive Alchemy Shops
[/color][b]2. [/b]More Luxorius Interiors
[b]3.[/b] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89742]Modernised Inns[/url]ï»¿

This mod changes the Alchemy Shops internally in architectural sense.The shops are now richer and more egzotic internaly,
and have new signs,which you can see at last picture.

The following shops are affected :[/i][/font]
[b]1.[/b] [i]Falkreath - Grave Concotions[/i]
[b]2[/b]. [i]Windhelm - White Phial[/i]
[b]3. [/b][i]Dawnstar - The Mortar And Pestle[/i]
[b]4. [/b][i]Riften - Elgrim's Elixirs[/i]
[b]5. [/b][i]Markath - The Hag's Cure[/i]
[b]6. [/b][i]Solitude - AngEline's Aromatics[/i]
[b]7.[/b] [i]Morthal - Thaumathurgist's Hut[/i]
[b]8.[/b] [i]Whiterun - Arcadia's Cauldron[/i][/size][i]
[/i]
